0.1.name: wordpress/wp-odesks
0.1.description:
This plugin uses Odesk API to display odesk profile, provider affiliate, and job affiliate in your website. This is a good tool in promoting your odesk profile as well as monetizing your website through odes affiliate program. This plugin is free to use.

Please follow the link below to view the live action of the plugin:

Odesk Profile: http://www.reygcalantaol.com/php-programmer-asp-programmer-web-developer-about.html

Odesk Jobs: http://www.reygcalantaol.com/odesk-rss-job-affiliate-jobs.html

Follow this link to view full documentation: http://www.reybornwebservices.com/plugins/wp-odesk-plugin/
